USER.DBQU_SelectUsuario: SELECT u.Id, u.Cedula, u.Correo, u.NombreYApellido, u.Celular, u.TipoUser, u.Estado, r.IdRol FROM act_User u LEFT JOIN act_RolUser r ON u.Id = r.IdUser WHERE u.Correo = @Correo AND u.Contrasena = @Contrasena
USER.DBQU_SelectListUser: SELECT Id, NombreYApellido FROM act_User WHERE TipoUser = 'Socio' OR TipoUser = 'Administrador'
USER.DBQU_SelectEmail: SELECT Correo FROM act_User WHERE Id =1
USER.DBQU_SelectIdUser: SELECT Id FROM act_User WHERE Cedula = @Cedula
USER.DBQU_SelectDataUserId: SELECT u.Id, u.Cedula, u.Correo, u.NombreYApellido, u.Celular, u.TipoUser, u.Estado, r.IdRol FROM act_User u LEFT JOIN act_RolUser r ON u.Id = r.IdUser WHERE u.Id = @Id

APOR.DBQA_SelectAportaciones: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Aportaciones) AS TotalAportaciones, a.*, u.NombreYApellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Aportaciones a INNER JOIN act_User u ON a.IdUser = u.Id
APOR.DBQA_SelectAportacionesUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalAportaciones, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE Estado ='APROBADO' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalAprobados, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM  act_Aportaciones WHERE Estado = 'EN ESPERA' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalEspera, a.* FROM act_Aportaciones a WHERE a.IdUser = @IdUser
APOR.DBQA_SelectAportacionesIdApor: SELECT Id FROM act_Aportaciones WHERE IdApor = @IdApor
APOR.DBQA_SelectAportacionesDataId: Select a.* FROM act_Áportaciones WHERE Id = @Id

MULT.DBQM_SelectMultas: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas WHERE Estado = 'PENDIENTE') AS TotalMultas, a.*,  u.NombreYApellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Multas a INNER JOIN act_User u ON a.IdUser = u.Id WHERE a.Estado = 'PENDIENTE'
MULT.DBQM_SelectMultasUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalMultas, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Multas WHERE Estado='CANCELADO' AND IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalCancelados, a.* FROM act_Multas a WHERE a.IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado ='PENDIENTE'
MULT.DBQM_SelectMultasIdMult: SELECT Id FROM act_Multas WHERE IdMult = @IdMult

EVEN.DBQE_SelectEventos: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Eventos WHERE Estado = 'CONCURSO') AS TotalEventos, x.*, u.NombreYApellido AS NombreUsuario FROM act_Eventos x INNER JOIN act_User u ON x.IdUser = u.Id WHERE x.Estado = 'CONCURSO'
EVEN.DBQE_SelectEventosUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Eventos WHERE Id = @Id) AS TotalEventos, a.* FROM act_Eventos a WHERE Id = @Id
EVEN.DBQE_SelectEventosIdEven: SELECT Id FROM act_Eventos WHERE IdEven = @IdEven

PRES.DBQP_SelectPrestamoId: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE Id = @Id) AS TotalPrestamos, a.* FROM act_Prestamos a WHERE Id = @Id
PRES.DBQP_SelectPrestamoUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser) AS TotalPrestamos, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado = 'APROBADO') AS TotalAprobado, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado IN ('DENEGADO', 'RECHAZADO')) AS TotalRechazado, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado  IN ('PENDIENTE REFERENTE', 'PENDIENTE ADMIN')) AS TotalPendiente, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND TipoCuota ='PagoUnico') AS TotalPagoUnico, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND TipoCuota = 'CUOTA') AS TotalCuota, a.* FROM act_Prestamos a WHERE IdUser = @IdUser
PRES.DBQP_SelectPrestamoIdPres: SELECT Id FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdPres = @IdPres

CUOT.DBQC_SelectCoutasUser: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Cuotas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado = 'PENDIENTE') AS TotalCuotas, a.* FROM act_Cuotas a WHERE IdUser = @IdUser AND Estado = 'PENDIENTE'
CUOT.DBQC_SelectIdCoutaIdCuot: SELECT a.* FROM act_Cuotas a WHERE Id = @Id

DEST.DBQD_SelectDestino: SELECT Id, NumeroCuentaB, NombreBanco FROM act_CuentasDestino

NOTI.DBQN_SelectAdmiNotificacion: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Notificaciones WHERE Destino = 'ADMINISTRADOR') AS TotalNotificaciones, a.* FROM act_Notificaciones a WHERE a.Destino ='ADMINISTRADOR'
NOTI.DBQN_SelectUserNotificacion: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM act_Notificaciones WHERE Destino = @Id) AS TotalNotificaciones, a.* FROM act_Notificaciones a WHERE Destino = @Id

Assistant_Queries.ASQ_SelectLastIdAporUser: SELECT IdApor FROM act_Aportaciones WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant_Queries.ASQ_SelectLastIdPresUser: SELECT IdPres FROM act_Prestamos WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant_Queries.ASQ_SelectLastIdCoutaUser: SELECT Id FROM act_Cuotas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant_Queries.ASQ_SelectLastIdMultaUser: SELECT Id FROM act_Multas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant_Queries.ASQ_SelectLastIdCapturaPantallaUser: SELECT Id FROM act_CapturasPantallas WHERE IdUser = @IdUser ORDER BY Id DESC LIMIT 1
Assistant_Queries.ASQ_SelectCorreoUser: SELECT Correo FROM act_User WHERE Id = @IdUser

Automatic_Queries.ATQ_SelectDateCuotasAll: SELECT a.Id, a.IdPrestamo, a.IdUser, a.IdCuot, a.FechaCuota, a.Valor e.NombreYApellido e.TipoUser FROM act_Cuotas a JOIN act_User e ON a.IdUser = e.Id WHERE a.Estado = 'PENDIENTE' OR a.Estado = 'PENDIENTE M1'
Automatic_Queries.ATQ_SelectParticipantesPrestamoEvento: SELECT a.Id, a.ParticipantesId FROM act_Eventos a WHERE Estado = 'CONCURSO' AND IdPrestamo = @IdPrestamo
